author: Nataly Barrera
title: Los utensilios de cocina que tienen PFOA son cancer√≠genos: ollas y sartenes - BluRadio
text: En la cocina hay una gran variedad de utensilios que se utilizan d√≠a a d√≠a y se han vuelto indispensables para preparar diferentes recetas culinarias. Sin embargo, seg√∫n la Organizaci√≥n Mundial de la Salud (OMS), algunos de estos pueden representar un gran peligro para la salud.Fue as√≠ como la organizaci√≥n advirti√≥ sobre la posible relaci√≥n entre ciertos materiales utilizados en la fabricaci√≥n de utensilios, como sartenes, ollas y cualquier objeto de tipo antiadherente, con sustancias qu√≠micas potencialmente cancer√≠genas.La sustancia que recubre estos objetos para que funcionen como antiadherente es el √°cido perfluorooctanoico (PFOA), la cual libera compuestos t√≥xicos al calentarse a altas temperaturas.Aunque muchos fabricantes han eliminado el PFOA de los utensilios de cocina de uso com√∫n, todav√≠a es recomendable vigilar el estado de estos productos y evitar su uso a temperaturas extremas.Esta sustancia qu√≠mica no solo se asocia con un mayor riesgo de c√°ncer, sino que tambi√©n ha sido vinculado a una serie de problemas de salud, entre las cuales se encuentran:Disminuci√≥n de la respuesta del sistema inmunitario a la vacunaci√≥n.Enfermedad hep√°tica t√≥xica.Toxicidad pulmonar y renal.Potencial genot√≥xico y cancer√≠geno, produciendo alteraciones o mutaciones en el material gen√©tico y distintos tipos de c√°ncer.Por lo tanto, se recomienda revisar si sus productos contienen este compuesto qu√≠mico, que aunque ya ha sido prohibido por la Uni√≥n Europea en el uso de utensilios de cocina desde julio de 2020, a√∫n se encuentran en objetos de ese a√±o o anteriores.Para identificar si sus ollas, sartenes y dem√°s implementos son seguros y no contienen el compuesto cancer√≠geno, debe buscar la etiqueta que dice \"sin PFOA\", la cual se puede encontrar en el empaque o tallada en el utensilio.

author: DayOfTheTentacle
title: #13 Confiesa que minti√≥ al denunciar una violaci√≥n en Zaragoza: "Ten√≠a miedo a mis padres por llegar tarde"
text:

Pues bueno...
Nadie se ha preguntado, por cada una de estas denuncias falsas demostradas, cu√°ntos inocentes condenados pueden haber en Espa√±a, empujados por una psicosis feminista?
Llevan 20 a√±os presionado, amenazado y se√±alado a jueces, empezando por el constitucional. Han estirado, publicitado y sobredimensionado un problema real, hasta hacer de ello un problema de primer orden, mientras nuestros j√≥venes se empobrecen m√°s y m√°s, por cuatro votos...
Han creado una larg√≠sima ristra de asimetr√≠as legales y administrativas entre hombres y mujeres, en nombre de la virtud de una igualdad quim√©rica.

Todo ello mientras el estado de derecho ha permitido, presuntamente, condenas injustas y negado la evidente existencia de denuncias falsas ...
C√≥mo era el lema del 15-M? Indignaros?
[#10](c10#c-10) Cualquier descerebrada tiene ahora el poder de limpiar su reputaci√≥n, aunque un inocente pise la c√°rcel y/o vea destrozada su vida.

author: Zack Cariola
title: Chicago White Sox received some promising news regarding three injured players
text:
The Chicago White Sox have had some of their players get hurt this spring, with a few players they‚Äôve signed this offseason going down with an injury.
One of those players who signed with the White Sox this offseason and got injured this spring is infielder Josh Rojas.
Rojas sustained a hairline fracture to his big toe, which could have affected his status for Opening Day, but thankfully, the Sox received a promising update on Rojas‚Äôs status.
According to White Sox beat writer Daryl Van Schouwen, Rojas got a workout in, rode on the stationary bike for cardio, and could be back on the field in the next few days.
‚ÄúIF Josh Rojas (hairline fracture big right toe) got a lift in, rode stationary bike, received treatment today. Said he hopes to be on a field in 3 or 4 days.‚Äù
This is great news for the White Sox, who also saw the return of outfielders Austin Slater and Andrew Benintendi, who are both in today‚Äôs lineup against the Milwaukee Brewers. Slater batting leadoff and playing rightfield and Benintendi batting third and is the designated hitter.
Rojas has had a fantastic spring, hitting .313/.353/.406 with an OPS of .759 in eleven games.
Rojas was signed to compete for one of the open infield spots, and with these numbers, he‚Äôs secured a spot.
The progress Rojas has made to get himself back onto the field is great news in a tough spring injury-wise.
Rojas is likely to be the White Sox‚Äôs Opening Day second, and he could also fill in at shortstop and third base, as he‚Äôs played at both positions this spring.
The White Sox will need Rojas to be healthy for at least the first half of this season if he is to be a valuable trade chip at this year‚Äôs trade deadline.
The news that Benintendi and Slater are back in the lineup is also great news, with those two being key pieces in the White Sox lineup for this season.

author: Amit Chaturvedi
title: Easter 2024: Significance, Traditions And All You Need To Know
text: Easter 2024: The day is commemorated through solemn rituals and heartfelt prayers. Easter is one of the most significant days on the Christian calendars and falls on the third day after Jesus' death on Good Friday. Easter marks a time of profound spiritual renewal and celebration. Rooted in both religious tradition and cultural festivity, Easter embodies the essence of hope, rebirth and joy. The day concludes the "Passion of Christ" series of holidays that start with Ash Wednesday. The Easter tradition is believed to be over 2,000 years old and one of the most important religious holidays for Christians. This year Easter is on March 31. At the heart of Easter lies the Christian belief in the resurrection of Jesus Christ three days after crucifixion, signifying victory over death and the promise of eternal life. His body was brought down from the cross and buried in a tomb. Three days after this, Jesus rose from the dead. He walked out of the tomb, appearing to one of his disciples Mary Magdalene. This sacred event is commemorated through solemn rituals, uplifting hymns and heartfelt prayers, uniting believers in gratitude and reverence. Easter traditions vary across cultures and regions, each adding a unique flavour to the festivities. From colourful egg hunts to elaborate feasts, families and communities come together to rejoice in the spirit of camaraderie and goodwill. Decorating eggs, exchanging gifts and indulging in sweet treats like chocolate bunnies are cherished customs that add to the merriment of the occasion. Promoted Listen to the latest songs, only on JioSaavn.com The symbolism of eggs and bunnies in Easter festivities dates back centuries, with each carrying its own significance. Eggs, representing fertility and new life, are adorned in myriad hues, symbolising the diversity and beauty of creation. Meanwhile, the Easter Bunny, a beloved figure in folklore, brings joy and laughter as it hops from home to home, delivering baskets filled with treats and treasures. Easter gatherings are marked by an abundance of delectable dishes, ranging from succulent roasts to freshly baked pastries. Families gather around the table, sharing stories, laughter and blessings, as they savour the flavours of the season. Whether it's a traditional lamb roast or a sumptuous Easter brunch, the feast symbolises abundance, generosity and gratitude. Beyond the festivities and feasting, Easter is a time for introspection and gratitude. It offers an opportunity to reflect on life's blessings, seek forgiveness and extend compassion to others. Through acts of kindness and charity, individuals embody the spirit of Easter, spreading love and goodwill to all.

author: Redacci√≥n Mundo
title: Israel descarta las negociaciones para una tregua en L√≠bano y mantiene los bombardeos
text: La ministra abiertamente hom√≥foba Orit Struck, del partido de extrema derecha Sionismo Religioso y encargada de la cartera de Asentamientos y Misiones Nacionales, dijo hoy que no existe un ‚Äúmandato moral para un alto al fuego. Ni durante 21 d√≠as ni durante 21 horas‚Äù. El primer ministro israel√≠, Benjam√≠n Netanyahu, enfri√≥ este jueves la posibilidad de una tregua en L√≠bano, tras d√≠as de intensos bombardeos contra el grupo chi√≠ Hizbul√°, que han dejado m√°s de 600 muertos y miles de heridos en el pa√≠s vecino. ‚ÄúLas noticias sobre un alto el fuego son incorrectas. Se trata de una propuesta franco-estadounidense, a la que el primer ministro ni siquiera respondi√≥‚Äù, indic√≥ esta ma√±ana la oficina del primer ministro, despu√©s de que trascendiera una propuesta de alto el fuego de 21 d√≠as. [Mundo](/mundo/)03:51 p. m. [Un sismo de magnitud 5,2 sacude al estado mexicano de Guerrero en medio del hurac√°n John](/mundo/2024/09/26/un-sismo-de-magnitud-52-sacude-al-estado-mexicano-de-guerrero-en-medio-del-huracan-john/) [Redacci√≥n Mundo](/people/redaccion-mundo) [M√°s Podcast](/podcast) Horas despu√©s, tras su llegada a Nueva York para participar en la Asamblea General de la ONU, el propio Netanyahu reiter√≥ que el pa√≠s seguir√° ‚Äúgolpeando a Hizbul√°‚Äù con todas sus fuerzas. ‚ÄúNo pararemos hasta lograr todos nuestros objetivos‚Äù, dijo en un v√≠deo compartido por su oficina. Los ministros m√°s radicales del Gobierno israel√≠ se apresuraron a mostrar su contundente rechazo a este nuevo borrador, que tambi√©n abogaba por impulsar una tregua en Gaza y la liberaci√≥n de los rehenes israel√≠es en el enclave. ‚ÄúNo debemos dar tiempo al enemigo con el fin que se recupere y se reorganice para continuar la guerra pasados 21 d√≠as‚Äù, dijo hoy el ministro de Finanzas, el radical y colono Bezalel Smotrich, en la red social X. Lea tambi√©n: [Mahmud Ab√°s afirma que ‚Äúel mundo entero es responsable‚Äù de Gaza por vender armas a Israel](https://www.vanguardia.com/mundo/2024/09/26/mahmud-abas-afirma-que-el-mundo-entero-es-responsable-de-gaza-por-vender-armas-a-israel/) La ministra abiertamente hom√≥foba Orit Struck, del partido de extrema derecha Sionismo Religioso y encargada de la cartera de Asentamientos y Misiones Nacionales, dijo hoy que no existe un ‚Äúmandato moral para un alto al fuego. Ni durante 21 d√≠as ni durante 21 horas‚Äù. Por el contrario, el l√≠der de la oposici√≥n, Yair Lapid, urgi√≥ a Israel a apoyar la propuesta franco-estadounidense, pero por un periodo de siete d√≠as, en lugar de los 21 sugeridos, ‚Äúpara no permitir que Hizbul√° rehabilite sus sistemas de mando y control‚Äù. Cuarto ataque contra Beirut Mientras las negociaciones se desarrollan en el marco de la Asamblea General de la ONU, Israel contin√∫a con su intensa campa√±a contra Hizbul√° en el L√≠bano, que hoy sum√≥ un nuevo ataque contra Beirut, el sexto desde que comenz√≥ el fuego cruzado entre el pa√≠s y el grupo chi√≠, en octubre pasado. El Ej√©rcito israel√≠ asegur√≥ haber matado al comandante de la unidad a√©rea de Hizbul√°, a quien identific√≥ como Muhamad Hosein Sarur, en un ataque a√©reo contra los barrios del sur de Beirut. Monumental discurso de Benjamin Netanyahu ante el congreso de EEUU ‚Äî Luis An√≠bal Rinc√≥n Arguello. ¬Æ üá®üá¥ (@Rincon001A) Aplaudieron de pie su intervenci√≥n Esto no es un enfrentamiento entre civilizaciones es un enfrentamiento entre la barbarie y una civilizaci√≥n "Estados Unidos e Israel se deben mantener unidos" Bravooo[pic.twitter.com/YYi5DKO5Ln][September 25, 2024] Fue el cuarto ataque en menos de siete d√≠as y el sexto desde que comenzaron las hostilidades. ‚ÄúEl bombardeo enemigo israel√≠ contra los suburbios sur de Beirut provoc√≥ el martirio de dos personas y (caus√≥) heridas a otras 15, entre ellas a una mujer que se encuentra en estado cr√≠tico‚Äù, dijo el Ministerio de Salud P√∫blica liban√©s en un comunicado, en el que especific√≥ que se trata de un ‚Äúbalance inicial‚Äù de v√≠ctimas. Asimismo, el Ej√©rcito israel√≠ prosigui√≥ este jueves con su campa√±a de ataques a√©reos en el sur y el este del pa√≠s, iniciada el lunes, y que ha dejado ya m√°s de 600 muertos, m√°s de un millar de heridos, y m√°s de 90.000 desplazados, seg√∫n estimaciones oficiales y de Naciones Unidas. Tambi√©n puede leer: [Absuelto Iwao Hakamada, el reo que pas√≥ 47 a√±os en el corredor de la muerte en Jap√≥n](https://www.vanguardia.com/mundo/2024/09/26/absuelto-iwao-hakamada-el-reo-que-paso-47-anos-en-el-corredor-de-la-muerte-en-japon/) El Estado hebreo est√° decidido a mantener su ofensiva en el L√≠bano y as√≠ lo hizo saber el ministro de Defensa israel√≠, Yoav Gallant, quien hoy aprob√≥ ‚Äúnuevas operaciones‚Äù tras reunirse con el jefe del Estado Mayor del Ej√©rcito, Herzi Halevi, y otros altos cargos militares. ‚ÄúSeguimos con la secuencia de operaciones: eliminar a los terroristas de Hizbul√°, desmantelar las formaciones ofensivas y destruir los misiles y cohetes‚Äù, indic√≥ el ministro. Este mismo jueves, la Brigada S√©ptima del Ej√©rcito, desplegada en la frontera norte, concluy√≥ una serie de ejercicios simulando una ofensiva contra territorio liban√©s, seg√∫n un comunicado castrense. El grupo pol√≠tico liban√©s Hizbul√° y su milicia, afiliado a Ir√°n, ha repetido durante meses que dejar√° de lanzar misiles y cohetes contra Israel si este detiene su guerra en Gaza, donde ya han muerto m√°s de 41.500 personas.

author: Redacci√≥n Los Andes
title: Un nuevo y econ√≥mico repelente casero se hace viral gracias a TikTok: c√≥mo se prepara
text: Ante la preocupaci√≥n por el aumento de casos de [dengue en Argentina](https://www.losandes.com.ar/economia/tras-las-criticas-al-ministro-de-salud-por-la-gestion-ante-el-dengue-el-gobierno-salio-a-dar-su-evaluacion/) y la escasez de repelentes comerciales, un ingenioso remedio casero se ha vuelto viral en la popular plataforma TikTok, ofreciendo una soluci√≥n accesible para muchas familias argentinas. Este descubrimiento surge como respuesta a la creciente demanda de medidas preventivas contra el Dengue, ya que la dificultad para adquirir repelentes comerciales debido a su escasez en el mercado ha sido un desaf√≠o para muchos. La receta es simple pero efectiva: utilizando el shampoo Plusbelle de manzana, f√°cilmente disponible en el mercado local, y mezcl√°ndolo con agua en una proporci√≥n de 60% de shampoo y 40% de agua, se ha creado un repelente casero que ayuda a mantener a raya a los mosquitos, incluidos los transmisores del Dengue. El proceso para preparar este repelente es sumamente sencillo: basta con mezclar el shampoo Plusbelle de manzana con agua en las proporciones mencionadas y colocarlo en un pulverizador. Posteriormente, se aplica sobre el cuerpo de manera similar a como se har√≠a con un repelente convencional y se espera que se seque sobre la piel. En el video, la usuaria @ciclicacomolaluna_, pone a prueba la eficacia de este m√©todo sumamente econ√≥mico para espantar a los insectos voladores. El clip alcanz√≥ m√°s de 925 millones de reproducciones y 16mil likes. En realaci√≥n a su efectividad, la ususria asegur√≥ que fue excelente, aunque quien la acompa√±a en el video aseguro ‚Äúla consistencia no me gust√≥‚Äù. Aunque numerosos usuarios han reportado su eficacia, se recomienda precauci√≥n y consultar con un profesional de la salud antes de utilizar este remedio casero, especialmente para aquellas personas con piel sensible o propensas a alergias. Este descubrimiento demuestra que, en tiempos de crisis y escasez, la creatividad y la innovaci√≥n pueden ofrecer soluciones pr√°cticas y asequibles para proteger la salud y el bienestar de la comunidad.

author: Kyle Troutman
title: Purdy Festival filled with fun
text: Wren Sversvold, 7, of Neosho, flies to the next ball on the ‚ÄúLeaps & Bounds‚Äù inflatable at the Purdy Festival on Saturday. Kyle Troutman/ktroutman@cassville-democrat.com Eli Gabriele, 5, of Washburn, is splashed as he goes down an inflatable water slide at the Purdy Festival on Saturday. author: Faisal Humayun
title: Growth Galore: 7 Long-Term Stock Picks for Prolonged Prosperity
text: In the late 1950s, the [average holding period](https://www.visualcapitalist.com/the-decline-of-long-term-investing/) for stocks was eight years. The average holding period had declined to 5.5 months as of June 2020. It‚Äôs unlikely to be any different in 2023. Of course, one reason for the decline in holding period is continued technological advancement that‚Äôs translates into new investment ideas. However, there is no doubt on the point that investor patience has declined. This column talks about seven long-term stocks that are likely to create value on a sustained basis. I must add here that even quality [blue-chip stocks](https://investorplace.com/stock-types/blue-chip-stocks/) can deliver long term returns that consistently bests the index. However, my focus in this column is on [growth stocks](https://investorplace.com/stock-types/growth-stocks/) that are worth holding until 2030. In my view, these long-term stocks can deliver 5x to 10x returns over the investment horizon. Let‚Äôs discuss the reasons to be bullish on these growth stories. Pinterest (PINS) After trading at lows of $20.6 during the year, Pinterest (NYSE: [PINS](https://investorplace.com/stock-quotes/pins-stock-quote/)) stock has trended higher by 41% in the last six months. The downside in PINS stock was on account of growth and valuation adjustments in the post-pandemic world. With that factor being discounted and with a [positive outlook](https://seekingalpha.com/news/4045049-snap-pinterest-gain-as-brokerages-see-improving-advertising-outlook) for the advertising industry, I am bullish on further upside for PINS stock. For Q3 2023, Pinterest reported revenue growth of 11% on a year-on-year basis to $763 million. This was the highest growth in the last five quarters. I believe the positive momentum is likely to sustain in the coming quarters. Pinterest reported 258 million monthly active users for the rest of the world (ROW) in Q3. In comparison, the MAU for U.S. and Europe were 96 and 128 million. However, the [average revenue per user](https://s23.q4cdn.com/958601754/files/doc_earnings/2023/q3/presentation/2023-Q3-IR-Earnings-Presentation.pdf) for ROW was just 12 cents with the global average being $1.61. As emerging markets catch-up in terms of advertising spend, there is ample scope for revenue and cash flow upside even if MAUs remain stable. Pinterest is likely to report operating cash flow of $500 million for the year. As the ARPU swells, the business will be a cash flow machine. Amdocs (DOX) Amdocs (NASDAQ: [DOX](https://investorplace.com/stock-quotes/dox-stock-quote/)) stock looks interesting after remaining sideways in the last 12 months. At a forward price-earnings ratio of 13.6, the stock seems poised for a breakout rally. Further, DOX stock offers an attractive dividend yield of 1.96%. As an overview, Amdocs is a provider of software and services to the media and telecommunication industry globally. For FY 2023, Amdocs reported revenue of $4.9 billion. Further, the company has a 12-month backlog of $4.15 billion, which provides clear revenue visibility. Another positive is that Amdocs [reported free cash flow of $698 million](https://investors.amdocs.com/static-files/3cd0613c-cb5c-4ed3-ab9d-f26bd4fa549a). As of September, Amdocs had a liquidity buffer of $1.2 billion. Financial flexibility is therefore high for organic and acquisition driven growth. In November, Amdocs partnered with Nvidia (NASDAQ: [NVDA](https://investorplace.com/stock-quotes/nvda-stock-quote/)) ‚Äúto optimize large language models to [speed adoption of generative AI applications and services](https://www.amdocs.com/news-press/amdocs-and-nvidia-accelerate-adoption-generative-ai-17-trillion-telecom) across the $1.7 trillion telecommunications and media industries.‚Äù In a big addressable market, the free cash flow outlook for the coming years looks robust. DraftKings (DKNG) Considering the growth potential for the online sports betting (OSB) and iGaming industry in the United States, DraftKings (NASDAQ: [DKNG](https://investorplace.com/stock-quotes/dkng-stock-quote/)) is a long term value creator. For year-to-date, DKNG has surged by 223% from oversold levels. The stock can be considered on corrections and consolidation. Talking about the market size, DraftKings expects the total addressable market for OSB and iGaming to be [$30 billion by 2030](https://draftkings.gcs-web.com/static-files/b6f14c7f-f4dd-4fcb-8c3c-637de5db2afb). This is just for the markets in which the Company is currently active. As more states legalize OSB and iGaming, the addressable market will swell. However, the key game-changer for DraftKings in 2023 has been improvement in EBITDA margin. For the next financial year, DraftKings has [guided for revenue and EBITDA](https://draftkings.gcs-web.com/news-releases/news-release-details/draftkings-reports-third-quarter-revenue-790-million-raises-2023) of $4.65 billion and $400 million. It‚Äôs likely that EBITDA margin will continue to expand beyond 2024. This sets stage for healthy revenue growth coupled with upside in cash flows. Kinross Gold (KGC) As gold trends higher on the prospects of multiple rate cuts, I am bullish on gold mining stocks. Further, factors like inflation and geopolitical tension support gold upside through the decade. Among emerging names, I like Kinross Gold (NYSE: [KGC](https://investorplace.com/stock-quotes/kgc-stock-quote/)) and I believe that the stock is a potential multibagger. It‚Äôs worth noting that KGC stock trades at an attractive forward price-earnings ratio of 15.3. Further, the stock offers a dividend yield of 1.94%. I expect healthy dividend growth in the coming years. Coming to the fundamentals, Kinross reported a [liquidity buffer of $2 billion](https://www.kinross.com/news-and-investors/news-releases/press-release-details/2023/Kinross-reports-strong-2023-third-quarter-results/default.aspx). Further, the Company is on track to deliver annual operating cash flow of $1.6 billion to $2 billion. With high financial flexibility, Kinross is positioned for organic and acquisition driven growth. I anticipate acquisitions with the Company guiding for stable production growth through 2025. The sale of Russian assets in 2022 was a setback that‚Äôs likely to be compensated with an opportunistic acquisition. Piedmont Lithium (PLL) Piedmont Lithium (NASDAQ: [PLL](https://investorplace.com/stock-quotes/pll-stock-quote/)) is among the deeply undervalued [lithium stocks](https://investorplace.com/industries/energy/renewable-energy/battery/lithium/) to buy for the long term. The correction in PLL stock has been driven by a decline in lithium prices. However, the long-term outlook for lithium is positive and Piedmont has quality assets. I expect multibagger returns in the next few years. It‚Äôs worth noting that Piedmont has commenced lithium concentrate shipments in Q3. For the quarter, the Company [reported revenue and EBITDA](https://piedmontlithium.com/wp-content/uploads/Piedmont-Lithium-Reports-Third-Quarter-2023-Results-US.pdf) of $47.1 million and $16.2 million respectively. I expect the current EBITDA margin of 34.3% to improve significantly as lithium trends higher. From a growth perspective, the commencement of lithium concentrate sales from the Quebec asset is just the beginning. Piedmont expect to [ramp-up production](https://piedmontlithium.com/wp-content/uploads/Earnings-Presentation-Q3-2023-vFINAL.pdf) from 56,500ktpy in 2023 to 525,000ktpa in 2026. This would translate into stellar revenue and cash flow growth. The recent correction in PLL stock therefore offers a golden opportunity for long term exposure. Coupang (CPNG) Coupang (NYSE: [CPNG](https://investorplace.com/stock-quotes/cpng-stock-quote/)) stock has been almost sideways in the last 12 months. I expect upside after an extended period of consolidation as business metrics improve. It‚Äôs worth noting that [e-commerce stocks](https://investorplace.com/industries/consumer-discretionary/retail/e-commerce/) have witnessed valuation readjustments after the pandemic. This seems like a good time to buy some of the best e-commerce stocks for the long term. CPNG stock looks attractive for multibagger returns in the next five years. For Q3 2023, Coupang reported net revenue of $6.2 billion that was higher by 21% on a year-on-year basis. For the same period, the EBITDA was $239 million with an EBITDA margin of 3.9%. An important point to note is that for trailing-twelve-months, Coupang reported free cash flow of $1.9 billion. The bottom-line for valuation is FCF and I expect cash flows to swell further on operating leverage. My view is underscored by the point that the Company expects ‚Äú [consolidated margin](https://s27.q4cdn.com/765243554/files/doc_financials/2023/q3/Q3-2023-Earnings-Release_Final.pdf) to continue its march upwards on an annual basis.‚Äù Further, [active customer growth](https://s27.q4cdn.com/765243554/files/doc_financials/2023/q3/3Q23-Earnings-Presentation_Final.pdf) has been healthy on a year-on-year basis. With multiple positive business metrics, I am bullish on CPNG stock. Miniso Group (MNSO) Moving from e-commerce to the brick-and-mortar model, Miniso (NYSE: [MNSO](https://investorplace.com/stock-quotes/mnso-stock-quote/)) is a lifestyle retailer that‚Äôs worth holding for the next few years. With global presence, Miniso has a big addressable market. Further, with an attractive pricing and a dynamic product portfolio, the Company has been successful in attracting consumers. For Q1 2024, Miniso reported revenue growth of 36.7% on a year-on-year basis to $519.6 million. For the same period, [adjusted EBITDA increased by 52.8%](https://filecache.investorroom.com/mr5ir_miniso/286/MNSO-930ER-24Q1.pdf) on a year-on-year basis to $139 million. I expect robust growth to sustain on the back of higher revenue per customer coupled with aggressive store expansion. As of Q1 2024, Miniso reported 6,115 stores globally. On a year-on-year basis, the number of stores increased by 819. With an asset-light model, EBITDA margin is likely to remain healthy. I must add that Miniso initiated dividends this year. It‚Äôs likely that dividend growth will be robust considering the current growth momentum.
